AllQuotes.quoteAll:
Countless souls have fallen prey to these hands. I too have been swallowed by the darkness — and yet you dare to drive me on. You may think of me as... your companion. You seek to find me salvation?
...You... really are a difficult being to comprehend.
No one bad is every truly bad. And no one good is ever truly good.
Freedom is life's great lie. Once you accept that, in your heart, you will know peace.

I arrived only in time to hear her dying breath. Why did she go to Khaenri'ah first, and not I. Why did she keep me in the dark about it? Was it to shield me? Facing the fact that she is gone is... unbearably painful

For those that live too long, the friends of days gone by and scenes from their adventures live on in their memories. As such I have no regrets in meeting you, friend. Should the day ever come that we are not together, you will continue to shine like gold in my memories.
The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation
Arise! Awake! And stop not until the goal is reached.

It may be that a perfect being does not exist at all in the whole world. Sometimes two people who appear to be completely opposite are actually two sides of the same coin and can only succeed when they work together.
So tell me, where should I go? To the left, where nothing is right or to the right, where nothing is left?
True change cannot be made if it is bound by laws and limitations, predictions and imagination
The eyes sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend
Loneliness is dangerous. Once you know how addicting it is, you don't want to deal with people anymore.
Use your insecurities to improve yourself, not to self-destruct and destroy others
Sometimes you have to be the bad guy to do something good, or you have to be the good guy to do something bad.
Those who forgive themselves and are able to accept their true nature- they are the strong ones
When the power of love overcomes the love for power, the world will know peace.
Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return
People's live don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith
Time doesn't heal anything. It just teaches us how to live with pain.
No matter how good your heart is, eventually you have to start treating people the way they treat you.

No single thing is perfect by itself. That's why we're born to attract other things to make up for what we lack. I think we start walking in the right direction only after we start getting our counterparts besides us.

Each of us lives dependent and bound by our individual knowledge and our awareness. All that is what we call reality. However, both knowledge and awareness are equivocal. One's reality might be another's illusion. We all live inside our own fantasies.
No matter who you are, you do not truly know what kind of man you will become until you reach the very end.
Everything is only fine for it's time

You see, humans are a unique type of pest multiplying and poisoning our world all while enforcing a structure of their own. A deeply, unnatural structure. Where others saw order, I saw a straitjacket, a cruel, oppressive world dictated by made-up rules. Seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, years, decades. Each life a faded, lesser copy of the one before. Wake up, eat, work, sleep, reproduce and die. Everyone is just waiting. Waiting for it all to be over. All while performing in a silly, terrible play, day after days. I could not do that. I could not close off my mind and join in the madness. I could not pretend. And I realized I didn't have to.
The only way forward is back.
Today, we will lie to you, and yet you will believe our little deceptions, because human beings are easily fooled due to their limited understanding of the inner workings of the universe.
You are my sadness and my hope. But mostly, you're my love.
There are rules in life. We can’t rush aging just because it’s convenient. And we can’t reverse death
But what is grief, if not love persevering?
Feelings are worth feeling, even if they hurt
Life is like riding a bicycle. Too keep you balance, you must going on
Everything has beauty but not everyone sees it
Every time you report a bug to the developer, you'll fix it yourself
Being a dick doesn't make yours any bigger.
The wounds you are not seeing, are the most difficult to heal.
A drop of love is more than an ocean of mind
Most People die at 25 and aren't buried until they are 75.
The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
Open your eyes, and look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
The day you stop racing, is the day you win the race.
Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
Do you remember who you were before the world told you, who you have to be?
I regret nothing in my life except for the things i didn't do.
If you were born without wings, do nothing to prevent them from growing.
If you don't like the path you're walking, make a new one.
When someone shows you their true colors, trust them
You are so brave and quiet I forget you are suffering
Paths are made by walking them
All you ever wanted is on the other side of fear
It must come from heart, what should touch the heart
Who never started, will never finish
Maybe there are better times, but this is our time
Pain is not only seen in tears, sometimes it is hidden behind a smile
Many can make you laugh but just a few can make you happy
The cage you dare not enter holds the treasure you seek
Don't give up on your dreams or your dreams will give you up
Sometimes the heart sees things that are invisible to the eye
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself
Life is like a coin, you can buy anything with it, but only once
Character can be seen in even the smallest actions
Even a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
You should not fear the death but to never live at all
Everything you can imagine is real
What would you do if you knew you couldn't fail?
Do it or don't do it, you'll regret both.
Broken people have the prettiest smiles because they know what happiness means
It's not the things that scare us, it's the way we think about them
The worst feeling is when you are at home but feel like you want to go home
Sometimes beautiful things end because people are not ready for them
If you weren't ready for it, you wouldn't have the opportunity.
The worst kind of sadness is the one you can't explain.
Although thoughts weigh nothing, one can collapse under their weight.
Grief isn't the opposite of happiness, it's a part of it.
Death must be a beautiful journey, because no one has returned yet.
You deserve the love you are trying to give to others all the time.
When I think of you I smile, but my heart hurts like hell
Losing your heart is the best way to discover you have one
It doesn't matter who's in front of you if you know who stands behind you
Sometimes nothing happens for a long time, and then everything happens at once
The moment you accept yourself, you become beautiful
Life keeps repeating things until you learn the lesson
What catches your eye shows you what your soul is looking for
I will never apologize for my heart that breaks so easily but loves so strongly
You can't be happy if what you're holding on to is something that makes you sad
You can touch me without touching me
You don't build a relationship with people in days, weeks or months, but in moments
How do you spell love? You don't spell it, you feel it
Some people care too much about you, I guess it's called love.
The whole world is a stage and we are all actors.
The grief that does not speak whispers the o'er-fraught heart, and bids it break.

Itachi Uchiha.quotePQ: It may be that a perfect being does not exist at all in the whole world. Sometimes two people who appear to be completely opposite are actually two sides of the same coin and can only succeed when they work together.

(About Kabuto) He reminds me of the old me. He thinks by getting everything he can accomplish whatever he wants to. And he makes himself believe that he can't fail, even if that really amounts to lying to himself. I stopped listening to what anyone else said and I stopped letting myself trust anybody. In his case, Kabuto was so deluded that he thinks all of these powers are his and his alone. I understand him too well. Both of us were used by the shinobi-world. He can't forgive himself or accept himself for what he truly is. It's clear that what he's doing is wrong but he's not completely to blame for not realising that. My chance has passed me by but he can still forgive himself.
So tell me, where should I go? To the left, where nothing is right or to the right, where nothing is left?
True change cannot be made if it is bound by laws and limitations, predictions and imagination

Vecna.quotePQ: You see, humans are a unique type of pest multiplying and poisoning our world all while enforcing a structure of their own. A deeply, unnatural structure. Where others saw order, I saw a straitjacket, a cruel, oppressive world dictated by made-up rules. Seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, years, decades. Each life a faded, lesser copy of the one before. Wake up, eat, work, sleep, reproduce and die. Everyone is just waiting. Waiting for it all to be over. All while performing in a silly, terrible play, day after days. I could not do that. I could not close off my mind and join in the madness. I could not pretend. And I realized I didn't have to.
